About me ...

Hello! I’m Marlon, a product designer, problem solver and a creative based in Accra, Ghana.

I specialize in the development of digital products, interfaces, and design systems. At Swoove, I'm now working on product and design systems, among other things. Product design, web design, ux & ui design, and ux research are some of my interests.

I'm passionate about working about complex systems and making them minimal, simple, and functional, and I incorporate this philosophy into all of my work.
